actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-117, by Ms. Pryce (OH).
Provides for consideration of a concurrent resolution providing for adjournment of the House and Senate for the Independence Day Work Period. Also, H. Res. 179 is laid on the table.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 48.

official_title: Providing for consideration of a concurrent resolution providing for adjournment of the House and Senate for the Independence Day district work period.

summary.text: Makes it in order to consider a concurrent resolution providing for the adjournment of the House of Representatives and Senate for the Independence Day district work period.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of a concurrent resolution providing for adjournment of the House and Senate for the Independence Day district work period.
